headline: Jim Cramer Says “Verizon is Kind of Like a Bond That Can Move Up a Little”
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently offered insights on. Inquiring about the stock, a caller pointed out the company’s “big cash flow and a fat dividend”. This is what Mad Money’s host had to say in response: “I think Verizon is kind of like a bond that can move […]

headline: T-Mobile (TMUS): Evaluating Valuation as Analyst Upgrades Highlight Growth, 5G Lead, and Market Momentum
summary: Recent analyst upgrades have put T-Mobile US (TMUS) in the spotlight, with both Wells Fargo and RBC Capital pointing to the company’s extensive 5G network, positive momentum in market share, and steady network innovations as reasons for optimism. These upgrades arrive as T-Mobile continues to set itself apart from competitors Verizon and AT&T due to its track record of subscriber growth and an expanding service portfolio. See our latest analysis for T-Mobile US. T-Mobile’s momentum isn’t just...
